title: The history of trauayle in the VVest and East Indies, and other countreys lying eyther way, towardes the fruitfull and ryche Moluccaes As Moscouia, Persia, Arabia, Syria, Ã†gypte, Ethiopia, Guinea, China in Cathayo, and Giapan: vvith a discourse of the Northwest passage.
